loans.name: Fermin Antonio

texts.es: Fermín de 50 años de edad es un hombre muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar, ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por brindarle  lo mejor a su familia. Actualmente vive junto a su esposa y su hijo,  es muy trabajador, siempre lo ha realizado con alegría y entusiasmo, se dedica a ser agricultor siembra todos los años maíz y maicillo. Fermín  desea incrementar sus ventas y por eso visitó las oficinas de INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros. Desea contar con la ayuda solicitada puesto que no tiene otros ingresos monetarios, y así el seguirá llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Fermín is 50 years old and lives with his wife and their son. He has always been a very responsible about his family obligations and has provided the best for his wife and child. Fermín is a very hard working farmer who grows corn and sorghum, and has always done his work cheerfully and enthusiastically. 
 
Fermín hopes to boost his sales, so he visited the offices of INTEGRAL to apply for a loan that will allow him to purchase seeds, manure, fertilizers, pesticides, and other supplies. Fermín doesn't have another income source, so he hopes to rely on these loan funds and continue providing for his family's daily needs without difficulty.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, manure, fertilizers, pesticides, etc.

loans.name: Luis Alonso

texts.es: Luis de 59 años de edad es muy amable y trabajador, vive con su familia en casa propia,  él trabaja muy duro en su propia parcela donde siembra maíz y frijol; sus productos son de muy buena calidad cuando su cosecha ya esta lista sale a  comercializarla a los diferentes mercados que están cerca de su lugar de residencia. Luis  solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL para contar con el dinero necesario e invertir en la compra de insumos agrícolas como controles de plaga, fertilizantes, abonos, semillas entre otras cosas que necesita para su siembra, y mejorar el terreno donde siembra que es el que muestra la fotografía, él ansía aumentar sus ventas para poder percibir mayores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Luis, 59, is friendly and hard working. He lives with his family in his own house. He works hard on his own land, where he plants corn and beans. His crops are high quality, and after harvesting, he sells the crops at various local markets. 

Luis has applied to INTEGRAL for a loan to buy farm supplies such as pest control, fertilizer, manure, and seed to plant and improve his land, which is shown in the photo. He wants to increase sales so that he can earn more and offer his family financial stability.

loans.use: to buy pest control, fertilizer, manure, and seed and to improve his land.

loans.name: 04-04-10-Nam Ngạn Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Hà operates a food stall/restaurant selling pig intestines. She is requesting a loan to to purchase pork and food to raise for reselling. 

Hà is 34 years old and she is married with two children.
Hà is the group leader of the 04-04-10-Nam Ngạn solidarity group, which consists of three members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, a urban area in Thanh Hoa province, and she has two dependents.

In 2008, Hà joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Hà has successfully repaid four loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Hà has been involved in this business for five years. The main hardship that Hà faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Hà hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to find good jobs.

loans.use: to purchase pork and food to raise for reselling.

loans.name: Amani

texts.en:
Amani is a 28-year-old, married woman. She has a shop where she sells and rents wedding dresses, in addition to accessories and bags. She opened her own shop in October 2010, and has a total of seven years of experience in this domain. Amani is a hard worker, well-known in her region for the quality of the products she provides. Her shop is located at the main road, which is a positive point toward attracting new customers and expanding her business.

Amani is applying for a YOUTH loan from Kiva's partner, Al Majmoua, to improve her accessories and bags collection with newly-released items. The new items will attract customers' attention, and will surely increase her income. As for the future, she is planning to expand her working space, and diversify departments to be each one specialized, with selected items.

loans.use: To improve her accessories and bags collection, by adding newly-released items

loans.name: Venancio

texts.en:
Venancio is a 42-year-old, married man, and a father of two young children. Venancio lives with his family in the town of Bien Unido, Bohol. He is a fisherman and has been in the fishing business for more than 20 years, now.

Venancio is asking for a loan to pay for the repair of the boat,  new fishing nets, and other equipment. With this use of the loan, he will be able to improve his fishing business and augment his income.

loans.use: to pay for the repair of the boat,  new fishing nets, and other equipment

loans.name: Isidro

texts.es: Isidro de 60 años de edad se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 40 años siembra frijol y maíz y con las ventas que realiza de sus cosechas logra solventar los gastos que tiene en su hogar, es un hombre responsable, honesto y trabajador vive con su esposa en casa propia. Isidro está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar insumos para su cosecha como: fertilizantes, abonos, semillas, fertilizantes, etc. ya que con lo que gana no le alcanza para cubrir esos gastos y así tener mejores ingresos y tener una mejor estabilidad económica
texts.en:
Isidro is 60 and a responsible, honest, and hardworking farmer who lives with his wife in their own home. He has for 40 years grown corn and beans, and selling his harvest allows him to meet his household expenses. 

Isidro is applying for a loan to purchase supplies for the harvest, including fertilizers, manure, and seeds. The additional supplies that these loan funds will allow Isidro to purchase will help him generate higher income and achieve greater financial stability.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, manure, seeds, and other supplies.

loans.name: Pedro Telmo

texts.es: Pedro de 42 años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus cinco hijos; él se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene 20 años de trabajar en este rubro y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas , el terreno de cultivo está ubicado en una zona de incidencia agrícola, él  comercia en todas las zonas aledañas y ya tiene mucha clientela fija, estas personas siempre prefieren su producto pues es de calidad y a precios realmente accesibles además el servicio es inigualable, adicional a su trabajo en el campo también trabaja de jornal en una finca cerca de su casa que le da ganancias extras para el mantenimiento del hogar; Pedro es un hombre dedicado a su labor, luchador siempre dispuesto a trabajar duro para alcanzar el éxito, quiere aprovechar el auge de su negocio para aumentar la producción y así poder tener mejores ganancias, necesita invertir en insumos pero no posee de capital suficiente por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla, abono, insecticida, herramienta, fertilizantes, etc. Pedro  tiene la confianza que así podrá darle a su familia la vida que se merecen.
texts.en:
Pedro, 42, lives with his life partner and their five children. He is a farmer, who grows corn and beans. He has been farming for 20 years and has garnered valuable experience which has led to better harvests. His land is located in an agricultural zone, and he sells his crops in the surrounding areas. He has regular customers because he offers quality products at affordable prices and unequaled service. He also works as a day laborer at a nearby farm to earn extra income for his household.

Pedro is dedicated to his trade and is always willing to work hard to achieve success. He wants to take advantage of increased business to raise production and earn more income. He needs to buy supplies, but he lacks sufficient funding. He has applied to INTEGRAL for a loan to buy seed, manure, insecticide, tools, fertilizer, and more. Pedro is certain that this will will enable him to give his family the life they deserve.

loans.use: to buy seed, manure, insecticide, tools, fertilizer, etc.

loans.name: Willian Alfredo

texts.es: William de 31 años de edad se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 7 años y eso le ha dado la capacidad y el conocimiento necesario para asistir sus cultivos, su principal siembra es maíz y  maicillo, comercializa sus cultivos en agencias de compra-venta de granos básicos que están cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra cubrir algunos  gastos que su familia tiene, vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, cuando pasa la temporada agrícola el cliente se dedica a trabajar en la albañilería, William está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar insumos agrícolas que le ayuden en la siembra de sus cultivos como: abonos, semillas, fertilizantes, herbicidas, etc.  y así poder tener mejores ganancias y seguir dándole lo necesario a su familia sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
William, 31, has been a farmer for seven years, which has given him the necessary skills and knowledge to grow his crops, mainly corn and maicillo. He sells his crops to nearby grain dealers. He is able to pay some of his family's expenses with the profits from his sales. He lives in his own house with his wife and two children. After the growing season, he works as a bricklayer.

William has applied for a loan to buy farm supplies such as manure, seed, fertilizer, and herbicide so that he can plant. This will allow him to earn more and give his family everything it needs.

loans.use: to buy manure, seed, fertilizer, herbicide, etc.

loans.name: Saima

texts.en: Saima is a 23-year-old single lady who financially helps her family. Almost two years ago, Saima took the initiative in her area and started an academy that offers educational services to poor students at cheap rates so they can have a better future. She is satisfied by doing this sort of business as it is beneficial for her household and society as a whole. She applied a loan of Rs. 25,000 through Kashf Foundation to purchase furniture for her academy, such as chairs and tables to accommodate more students.  She is hopeful to have more students in her academy in the coming days.

loans.use: to purchase furniture for her academy such as chairs and tables.

loans.name: Sabia

texts.en:
Sabia is a 34-year-old married woman; she has expertise in embroidery and is using her skill to provide for her family for many years. She started this line of work at a very young age. During the initial years of her business, she barely made enough money to purchase the required materials. Today she is proud to be famous in her community for being the best at making beautiful patterns with thread and beads. 

She wants to grow her business, so she requested a loan of Rs 35,000 to buy raw materials such as threads, sequins, ribbons, and pearls in various colors to meet the increasing demand. She is in her second loan cycle and she has a good loan history. She expects a boost in her earnings and wishes to open her own shop in the market to display her work.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as threads, sequins, ribbons, and pearls in various colors.

loans.name: Samina

texts.en:
Samina is 36 years old and a married lady. She is involved in a business of stitching clothes. She has been in this line of work for five years now, and is proud to be contributing to her household income. When Samina was not earning income, her family was going through a severe financial crisis that compelled her to use her stitching skills in a productive manner. Before, her husband was the only breadwinner of the family. Samina felt it necessary to change her family’s living standard, so she started working from home. She is a brave woman, and her hard work helped her establish a good clientele, but she was having difficulty in fulfilling large orders. That’s when she decided to borrow from Kashf Foundation.

Currently, she has requested a loan of Rs 45,000. She will use the loan to purchase a new stitching machine, with some spools of thread and lace in various colors. 

In a short span of time, she has expanded her work. Now she is successfully running a stitching business. It’s her seventh year with Kashf Foundation, and she has shown excellent repayment behavior.

loans.use: to purchase a new stitching machine, with some spools of thread and lace in various colors.

loans.name: Shahnaz

texts.en:
Shahnaz is a 35-year-old, married woman. She has been successfully running a business of flower-making for many years. She offers various colorful flowers for decorating homes and events like birthdays, parties etc. She sells them to the people of her community and also supplies them in the local market.  

Shahnaz has good communication skills and has a good client list. She is a mother of four and is motivated to provide for her family. She wants to grow her business, so she requested a loan of PKR 20,000 to buy raw materials including wires, cutters, floral tape, scissors, beads, paints, and tissue paper. In this way, she would be able to consistently meet the increasing demands of her customers. 

Shahnaz wishes to spend part of the revenues to deal with the expenses of her family and to increase her business capital.

loans.use: to buy raw materials including wires, cutters, floral tape, scissors, beads, paints, and tissue paper.

loans.name: Dionesio

texts.en: Dionesio is a 58-year-old married man from Talibon, Bohol. He engages in a pottery-making business. He makes pots out of clay and a cement mixture. He has been in the pottery-making business for more than ten years. He requested a loan of 6000 PHP to buy more clay pot molds (in various sizes) for fast production of pots. In the future, Dionesio would like to expand his pottery business to Talibon Market to cater to more customers as well.

loans.use: to buy more clay pot molds (in various sizes)

loans.name: Anyak

texts.en:
Anyak and his family live in the village of Tsavi which is in the Sunik region. Anyak is locksmith and a tractor-driver. He has worked as a tractor-driver in his native village for many years. He is married and has two daughters, who are also married and live separately. He also has a son, who together with his father. is engaged in farming activities. 

Both Anyak and his son also work at their local forest preserve as inspectors.
 
Father and son manage farming very well and with pleasure. On the farm they have a cow, a calf, four piglets and ten chickens. Their monthly income that they receive from the sale of farm products covers their basic needs and farm expenses, but it is not sufficient to grow his farm and increase the profit. So Kiva lenders are his only hope. Anyuk asks for a loan in order to buy eight piglets and the animal fodder to feed them. This purchase, he thinks, will give him a chance to sell a lot of pork to Kapan butchers and to earn a good profit from it.

loans.use: To buy eight piglets and animal fodder in order to enlarge his swine breeding operation and to receive a good profit

loans.name: Saiqa

texts.en:
At the age of 23, Saiqa is an enthusiastic married lady. She is doing a business of clothing sales to contribute to her family income. She offers wide variety of clothes to the people of her community at reasonable prices. She has becomes famous by providing good quality clothes and has retained regular customers. In order to expand her business, she needs to buy more variety of clothes in different colors and designs for the upcoming event of Eid-ul-Fitar (a religious event of Muslims). 

For this reason, she requested a loan of PKR 35,000 from Kashf Foundation. In this way, she would be able to earn more income through her greater sales. She is in her third loan cycle and hopes to have a good experience with this new loan.

loans.use: to buy more varieties of cloth in different colors and designs.

loans.name: Paula Benilda

texts.es: La cliente es de la ciudad de Portoviejo.  Empezó tiempo atrás por consejo de unas amigas que la motivaron a trabajar vendiendo productos de la línea Yanbal y Avon, dado que en ese momento no dísponía de un trabajo.  Desde ese momento se ha mantenido laborando con esta actividad, en donde le ha ido muy bien hasta ahora.  Trabaja de lunes a sábado, ofreciendo sus productos a familiares, amigos y personas de su barrio.  Es soltera y tiene una hija de 20 años.  Necesita el dinero para invertirlo en colonias, lociones y collares.
texts.en:
The client lives in the city of Portoviejo.  She started some time ago when some friends encouraged her to work by selling Yanbal and Avon products.  At that time she did not have a job.  Since that time she has continued working with this business activity where it has gone very well for her so far.

She works Mondays through Saturdays selling her products to relatives, friends, and people from her neighborhood.  She is single, and she has a 20 year old daughter.  She needs the money to buy colognes, lotions, and necklaces.

loans.use: to buy colognes, lotions, and necklaces.

loans.name: Eva Del Carmen

texts.es:
Eva tiene 38 años de edad, es casada y tiene tres hijos. Es una señora muy trabajadora con muchas metas por cumplir al lado de su esposo, actualmente tiene crianza de pollos indios que los vende en el cantón a muy buen precio; pero ademas de eso ella trabaja en la escuela del cantón elaborando la comida para los alumnos de dicha escuela y es de esa forma que ella obtiene sus ingresos para tener una mejor alimentación de sus hijos. 
       
Los insumos que utiliza para la crianza de los pollos indios como el maíz y maicillo los produce su esposo ya que se dedica a la siembra de granos básicos.  

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar de una cocina da gas y el gas que utilizara para elaborar la comida. Ella tendrá ubicada su venta a la par de la cancha donde juegan los estudiantes y equipos que llegan a jugar en los torneos que se realizan en el cantón.

Se le estará apoyando para que pueda comprar su propio equipo de trabajo; ya que por el momento no contaba con el equipo adecuado para comenzar a hacer comida para vender afuera de la cancha.  Así, poseerá una fuente de ingreso propia, que le ayudara a mejorar su calidad de vida y la de sus hijos.

Eva en un futuro muy próximo se ve con un pequeño comedor a la par de la cancha atendiendo clientes y dando un servicio de calidad.
texts.en:
Eva is 28 years old, married, and has three children.  She is a hard-working woman with many goals to accomplish along with her husband.  She is currently breeding native chickens that she sells in the canton [district] for a very good price.  Besides that she works in the canton school preparing food for the students of the school.  In this way she earns income in order to have better food for her children.  Her husband works at cultivating basic grains, and produces the supplies she uses for raising the native chickens, like corn and gravel.

The loan that she is soliciting from Fundación Campo is to purchase a gas stove and gas that she will use to prepare the food.  She will have a food stall located near the field where students play and teams come to play in tournaments that take place in the canton.  You will be supporting her ability to purchase her own equipment for work, because at the moment she cannot rely on the proper equipment to begin making food to sell outside the field.  Thus she will have her own source of income, which will help to improve the quality of her life and of her children.

In the very near future, Eva will be serving clients and providing quality service near the field.

loans.use: to buy a gas stove and gas that shee will use to prepare food.

loans.name: María Concepción

texts.es:
María tiene 34 años de edad, tiene dos hijas. Es una mujer trabajadora, emprendedora con grandes deseos de superación, es ama de casa y a la vez elabora pasteles, yuca y empanadas para vender y así poder tener una fuente de ingresos para darles una mejor alimentación a sus hijas. Ademas, de los bocadillos típicos que ella hace, también vende productos de belleza por catalogo de esa forma  demuestra que lo que se quiere se puede lograr.
       
Los materiales que utiliza para  la elaboración de los bocadillos típicos como el plátano, la azúcar, sal, chile, repollo entre otros los adquiere en el mercado. El tiempo que tarda el micro bus en llegar al cantón desde su casa hasta la ciudad es de 30 minutos.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar plátano,  azúcar, sal, chile, repollo, bolsas, verduras  y una cocina de gas.  De esta manera, comprara los materiales y  un equipo adecuado para tener mas eficiencia en su trabajo diario.

Con la inversión, pretende una mejor alimentación para su familia, porque generara mas ingresos y se le apoyara para la compra de materiales para la elaboración de los bocadillos típicos y así pueda crecer como una micro-empresa.  

María quiere en un futuro tener un negocio fuerte y que pueda abastecer a todo el cantón con productos y bocadillos de calidad.
texts.en:
María is 34 and has two daughters. She is a hardworking and enterprising woman with big plans to improve her current situation. As well as being a housewife, she makes cakes, cassava and pastries which she sells to earn money to feed her children. She also sells beauty products from a catalogue, and believes if she works hard she will achieve her goals.

She buys the ingredients she needs to make her food in the market, such as bananas, sugar, salt, chilli and cabbage. It takes her 30 minutes to get from her house to the city by minibus.

María is asking for a loan to buy bananas, sugar, salt, chilli, cabbage, bags, vegetables and a gas stove, so she will have the ingredients and equipment she needs to be more efficient in her daily work.

With this investment she aims to be able to provide more food for her family, as she will generate a greater income which will in turn enable her to buy more ingredients and thereby grow her mini-business.

In the future, María wants to have a strong business which can supply the whole community with quality products.

loans.use: to buy bananas, sugar, salt, chilli, cabbage, bags, vegetables and a gas stove.

loans.name: Ilenia

texts.es:
Ilenia tiene  35 años, está casada y tiene 04 hijos con quienes vive en su casa propia. Se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 15 años y considera que es un buen sustento para su hogar ya que siembra cacao orgánico. Cuenta con el apoyo de algunos jornaleros a quienes paga para que realicen algunos trabajos forzados como el retiro de maleza entre sus terrenos y a recolectar los frutos maduros en tiempo de cosecha.
Anteriormente laborada al lado de su esposo quien actualmente se desempeña como cocinero en la ciudad siéndole de gran apoyo económico para el sustento de su hogar. Desea con el tiempo juntar una buena cantidad de dinero y abrir un negocio particular para permanecer en la ciudad y dedicarse de lleno a sus hijos y es conciente que solo es posible trabajando con la motivación que la caracteriza. Este es su segundo préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. En esta ocasión desea contar con 500 nuevos soles para comprar herramientas como: machete, alambres y tijeras de podar esperando realizar sus labores agrícolas con las facilidades del caso.
texts.en:
Ilenia is 35 years old and is married. She lives with her 4 children in her own house. She has been working in agriculture for 15 years and considers it a good way of supporting the household as she grows organic cocoa. She has help from some day workers who she pays to do some of the hard work such as clearing weeds from her plots of land and picking the ripe fruits at harvest time.

Previously she worked alongside her husband, who is currently working as a chef in the city, which is a big financial help towards the household expenses. Over time she wants to build up a decent sum of money and open a private business in the city so she can dedicate herself fully to her children. She realises this is only possible by working with the motivation which she already has.

This is her second loan with Kiva and she is grateful for the financial support she receives to make progress in life. She also promises to pay her instalments punctually. This time she wants to have 500 nuevos soles to buy tools such as a machete, wire and pruning shears, hoping to carry out her agricultural tasks with the necessary resources.

loans.use: to buy tools such as a machete, wire and shears.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años y eso le ha dado la capacidad y el conocimiento necesario para asistir sus cultivos, su principal siembra es el maíz y frijol, comercializa sus cultivos en agencias de granos básicos que están cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas ayuda en los gastos que su familia tiene, vive con su esposa y su hijo, el cliente está solicitando un crédito para poder comparar insumos agrícolas que le ayuden en la siembra de sus cultivos como: abonos, semillas, fertilizantes, herbicidas, herramientas, etc.  y así poder tener mejores ganancias y seguir ayudando en los gastos de su casa sin ninguna limitación.
texts.en: The client has made a living through agriculture for several years, and that has given him the ability and the necessary knowledge to assist his crops.  His main plants are corn and beans. He sells his products in basic grain agencies, that are close to his place of residence. He helps with family expenses with the earnings from his sales. He lives with his wife and his son.  The client is requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies to help plant their crops such as: manure, seeds, fertilizers, herbicides, tools, etc.  If he has better profits, he can continue to help with home expenses, without limitation.

loans.use: to buy manure, seeds, fertilizers, herbicides, tools, etc.

loans.name: Maritza Rosalia

texts.es:
MARITZA TIENE 48 AÑOS DE EDAD DE ESTADO CIVIL UNIÓN LIBRE, NO TIENE HIJOS, VIVE CON EL CONYUGUE EN EL CANTÍON VENTANAS PROVINCIA DE LOS RÍOS.

ES INTEGRANTE DE LA VRC LA CHONTA, SE ENCUENTRA UBICADA EN EL RECINTO LA CHONTA, PERTENECE AL CANTÓN VENTANAS SE DEDICAN A LABORES AGRÍCOLAS Y PECUARIAS.

MARITZA SE DEDICA A LA AGRICULTURA A LA SIEMRA DE MAÍZ, SOYA, ARROZ. SOLICITA EL CRÉDITO PARA COMPRAR FERTILIZANTES, INSECTICIDAS, ABONOS. CON LA AYUDA DEL CRÉDITO PODRÁ COMPRAR LO QUE NECESITA PARA LA AGRICULTURA. LAS COMPRAS Y LAS VENTAS LO HACE EN VENTANAS.

EL SUEÑO ES COMPRAR UNA FINCA. EN EL TIEMPO LIBRE LE GUSTA PASAR CON LA FAMILIA Y DISFRUTAR DE LAS FIESTAS DEL CANTÓN.
texts.en:
Maritza is 48 years old, in a common-law relationship, and has no children. She and her partner live in the canton of Ventanas, which is in Los Ríos Province.

Maritza is a member of the Communal Bank “La Chonta”, which is located in the in the precinct of La Chonta in the canton of Ventanas. The members engage in farm work and raising livestock.

Maritza is a farmer who grows corn, soybeans, and rice. She is requesting a loan in order to buy fertilizers, insecticides, and compost. With the help of this loan, she will be able to buy what she needs for farming. Her purchases and sales are conducted in Ventanas. Her dream is to buy a farm.

In her free time, Maritza enjoys spending time with her family and watching the festivals that are held in the canton.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, insecticides, and compost.

loans.name: Nargis

texts.en:
Nargis is a 24-year-old, married woman and a mother of three children. The man shown in the photo is her husband who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family expenses. Her husband is the only bread-earner in the family and he wants to provide a safe and sound journey to the passengers. 

For this reason, Nargis applied for a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase new tires and a new CNG (compressed natural gas) kit for her husband's vehicle. Nargis is in her third loan cycle and is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to purchase new tires and a new CNG kit for her husband's vehicle.

loans.name: Karisa

texts.en: Karisa started a small retail shop with contributions from his relatives. He has been running the retail shop for the last two years now. He knew about Milango through friends since he wanted funds to expand his business operations. The major challenges that he faces in the business include price changes and theft. He now seeks a loan to buy a weighing machine and a counter table for his shop. The extra income that he will raise from the loan will help his family improve their living standards.

loans.use: to buy a weighing machine and a counter table

loans.name: Naheed

texts.en: Naheed had a difficult time after her husband's business failure. She decided to work with her husband, to support her family for a better future. Five years ago, she began stitching work in her house. She stitches for the people living around her house and uses the income to support her entire family. However, due to a lack of available of funds, she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. So she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of Rs. 20,000. She intends to use this loan amount to buy spools of thread in different colors, with some packs of lace, zippers and needles. She expects a boost in her earnings, and aspires to save money for the expansion of her business.

loans.use: to buy spools of thread in different colors, with some packs of lace, zippers and needles.

loans.name: Yasmeen

texts.en: Yasmeen, age 44, is a married woman. She has been running a business of milk sales, for many years. She has two cows in milk. She milks the cows, and then sells their milk to many of her neighbors, along with butter and cheese that she makes from the milk. Her business is good enough for her to lead a decent life. She is a mother of four children, and needs to earn much more to meet their everyday expenditures, including food, clothing and education. In order to make greater profits, she requested a loan of Rs 35,000. She will use it to buy one more cow, to enable her to serve more customers. She hopes to get an increase in the milk-producing capacity, which ultimately will help to generate more cash.

loans.use: to buy one more cow, for dairy use.

loans.name: Abeer

texts.en:
Abeer was born in 1981. She lives in Amman, Jordan. She has been running a gift shop for five years, making and selling teddy bears, hearts and cats. Since she works with her husband, she decided to let him appear in the picture with her. 

Abeer has found this project profitable to her, so she is planning to expand it and buy more machines in the future. For now, Abeer needs money to be able to buy new raw materials, like fabric, foam, and string. These materials will enable her to do more work, so she is requesting a loan for it.

loans.use: to buy new raw materials, for making more teddy bears and similar gifts

loans.name: Khachatur

texts.en:
Khachatur lives in the village of Tandzaver which is in the Syunik region. He has received a specialty of being a hoist man and for several years he has taken part in different building works in his region. Khachatur is married and has a son, who is married and with his family, lives in his paternal home. Khachatur’s wife and daughter-in-law do not work and help him in farming and agriculture. They cultivate beans, greens, tomatoes, and cucumbers. On their farm they breed two cows, two calves, three piglets and twenty chickens. Khachatur also does some hired work at other village farms, which is a small source of income for their family.  

Khachatur is asking for a loan as he wants to buy two calves and diesel fuel, and the other part of the loan amount will be spent on harvesting activities.

loans.use: to buy two calves and diesel fuel, and the other part of the loan amount will be spent on harvesting activities

loans.name: Alfarina Bienvenida

texts.es: La cliente vive en Portoviejo.  Desde sus inicios, se dedicó de lleno a la costura, tomando cursos y trabajando en ello siendo aún soltera.  Más adelante, también emprendió en la venta de productos naturales, debido a que personas que promocionaban esta actividad, la convencieron y decidió involucrarse para poder mejorar sus ingresos.  Es viuda y tiene 3 hijos, quienes ya son todos mayores de edad.  Necesita el préstamo para la compra de champú, telas y vitaminas que son parte de su negocio.
texts.en:
The client lives in Portoviejo.  Since the beginning, she has devoted herself completely to sewing.  She took classes and worked at sewing when she was still single.  

Later, she also undertook selling natural products.  She did this because the people promoting this business activity convinced her, and she decided to become involved in order to be able to improve her income.

She is a widow, and she has three children who are all adults now.

She needs the loan to buy shampoo, fabric, and vitamins that are part of her business.

loans.use: to buy shampoo, fabric, and vitamins that are part of her business.

loans.name: Las Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
Las Emprendedoras esta en su ciclo 11 del programa de mujeres emprendedoras, ellas luchan y trabajan juntas para fomentar su compañerismo. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde 2 de ellas se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, es decir con ingresos bajos, pero son conscientes de que la única forma de crecer es por medio de su trabajo.
La Sra. Rosa es la Tesorera del grupo, ella es vendedora de Verduras y también de hielos, y comenta que solicita de este crédito para poder utilizar en la compra de sus verduras tales como, locotes, cebollas, tomates, papas, ajos, lechugas y bolsitas para su hielo entre otras cosas. Ella esta agradecida de formar parte del grupo, que les ayudará a seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
“Las Emprendedoras” (The Enterprising Ones) is a group that is in its 11th loan cycle with the Women Entrepreneurs Program. They strive and work together in order to promote friendship. They have taken a poverty elimination survey, which indicates that two of the members are below the poverty line. In other words, they have low income. However, they are aware that they only way to grow is through their work.

Sra. Rosa is the group treasurer. She sells vegetables and ice. Rosa says that she is requesting a loan for buying vegetables such as peppers, onions, tomatoes, potatoes, garlic, lettuce, as well as bags for packing ice, and other items. She is grateful to be part of this group, which helps her to keep growing.

loans.use: to buy peppers, onions, tomatoes, potatoes, garlic, lettuce, as well as bags for packing ice, and other items.

loans.name: Soumana

texts.fr:
Monsieur Soumana  est né vers 1979 à Maba où il réside, père de 5 enfants il vit dans une famille traditionnelle avec son époux et  ses enfants.         . 
Il mène des activités d’achat stockage vente de céréales et produits agricoles  il y’a plus de 6 ans. Son approvisionnement en céréales se fait à Dioïla et environnants. Il livre ses produits à Dioïla après les avoir stocké pendant quelques mois. Il est à son quatrième prêt, et les trois précédents furent remboursés sans aucune difficulté. Avec ce nouveau prêt il compte acheter une tonne de mil, une tonne de maïs qui seront stockés dans son magasin et vendus au moment voulu. La vente se fait en détail à ses clients composés de revendeurs et de consommateurs,  dans le magasin ou même au marché. Avec ce nouveau prêt, il compte réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 70.000FCFA. Ce bénéfice sera utilisé pour agrandir le pouvoir d’achat, et subvenir aux dépenses de la famille..
texts.en:
Monsieur Soumana  was born around 1979 in Maba where he still lives. He is a father of five and lives in a traditional family with his wife and children. 
He has been involved in the purchase and sale of cereals and agricultural products for 6 years. He sources his goods from Dioïla and the surrounding areas. He delivers his products to Dioïla after having stocked them for several months. He is on his fourth loan and the third previous loans have all been repaid successfully. With this new loan he aims to purchase a tonne of millet and a tonne of corn which will be stored in his shop and sold when required. He retails his goods to a customer base of wholesalers and end consumers, from his store or the market. With this new loan he aims to generate an average monthly profit of 70,000 FCFA. This profit will be used to increase his purchasing power and meet his family's needs.

loans.use: to purchase cereals

loans.name: Cecilia Guadalupe

texts.es: Cecilia de 33 años de edad vive en casa de un familiar con su esposo y sus dos hijos, es muy conocida en la zona donde reside por su humildad y su entrega al trabajo, nunca se ha dejado vencer y siempre ha salido adelante con sus dificultades. Con esfuerzo y dedicación posee una tienda en la que vende productos de primera necesidad granos básicos, leche, huevos, arroz, aceite, salsas de tomates, entre otros, es muy dedicada a su labor y muy servicial a la hora de vender, es por eso que posee clientes que la buscan y la prefieren por sus productos. Se ha visto en la necesidad de surtir un poco más la tienda debido al aumento de demanda y no tiene el capital para realizarlo, es por eso que la clienta solicita un crédito para comprar más productos como granos básicos producto instantáneo, golosinas, bebidas, etc. Confía en Dios de que pronto la ayuda solicitada, será otorgada, y no tendrá más preocupación que llevar el sustento diario a su hogar.
texts.en:
Cecilia, age 33, lives in her family’s home with her husband and two children. She is well-known in the area where she lives for her humility and her devotion to her work. Cecilia has never felt defeated and is always able to press forward through difficulties. With effort and dedication, she manages a store where she sells basic necessities such as milk, eggs, rice, oil, tomato sauces, and other products. She enjoys her work and is very helpful when conducting her sales. For this reason, her customers seek her out and prefer to buy her products.

Cecilia needs to stock her business with a bit more inventory because of increased demand, but she does not have the capital to do this. For this reason, she is requesting a loan in order to buy more merchandise such as basic grains, instant products, candy, beverages, and other items. She trusts that God will quickly grant the help she requested. As a result, she will have no worries as to how she will provide for the daily needs of her household.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, instant products, candy, beverages, and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stocks to sell, like canned goods, soda, soap, toiletries, and noodles, among others.

loans.name: Mayra Alejandra

texts.es: La cliente reside en la ciudad de Portoviejo.  Empezó a raíz del nacimiento de su hijo, cuando se dio cuenta de que necesitaba tener un ingreso adicional.  Entonces inición vendiendo ciertas cosas que las personas por su barrio más buscaban.  Trabaja todos los días con su hermana y su mamá.  Es soltera pero tiene un niño de 2 años.  Necesita el dinero para comprar artículos de bazar (cuadernos, moños y lápices).
texts.en: This client lives in the city of Portoviejo.  She started when her son was born and she noticed that she’d need to earn additional income.  She then started selling certain things people in the neighborhood wanted the most.  She works every day with her mother and sister.  She’s single but has a two-year-old little boy.  She needs money to buy merchandise (notebooks, ribbons and pencils).

loans.use: to buy notebooks, pencils, ribbons.

loans.name: Alba Lorena

texts.es: La cliente vive en la ciudad de Portoviejo.  Tiempo atrás ella pintaba uñas y a través de sus clientes que la incentivaron, empezó con la actividad que emprende actualmente (venta de cosméticos y productos de belleza) y la que le ha dado buenos resultados hasta el día de hoy.  Trabaja de lunes a sábado en compañía de su hermana y le ofrece sus productos a sus vecinas, amigas y conocidas.
texts.en: This client lives in the city of Portoviejo.  Some time ago she used to work applying nail polish and some of her customers motivated her to start the activity she’s currently in (cosmetics and beauty products sales).  It has produced good results for her to this day. She works Monday to Saturday with her sister and offers her goods to neighbors, friends and acquaintances.

loans.use: to buy creams, perfumes, costume jewelry, and cosmetics for her business

loans.name: Dora Alicia

texts.es: Doña dora de 59 años de edad se dedica a la siembra de maíz y a la pesca artesanal desde hace varios años, tiene mucha clientela ya que su producto es fresco y a precios realmente accesibles, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gasto de su hogar vive en casa propia con su familia, doña dora está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar trasmallos para la pesca y poder arreglar la lancha que es la que muestra la fotografía ya que esa es su fuente de trabajo para poder realizar la pesca, así obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Dora is 59 years old and has made a living by planting corn and artisanal fishing for several years.  She has many customers because her product is fresh and the prices are really affordable.  With the profits, she manages to cover certain household expenses.  She lives in her own home with her family.  

Dora is requesting a loan to buy trammel nets for fishing and to fix the boat that is shown in the photo, since this is her source of work for the fishing.  Better profits will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy trammel nets for fishing and to fix the boat

loans.name: Santos

texts.es: Santos de 57 años de edad  vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus tres hijos, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol tiene muchos años de dedicarse a la agricultura por lo que se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en el rubro, es muy conocido en la zona y ya tiene buena clientela pues obtiene las mejores cosechas, por lo tanto comercia producto de primera calidad y a precios muy accesibles, además el servicio es inigualable, santos se caracteriza por su gran amabilidad, es un hombre emprendedor con muchas ganas de salir adelante, piensa que aprovechar las oportunidades lo llevaran un paso más adelante del éxito; en la última siembra no obtuvo las ganancias esperadas y esta vez quiere aumentar la producción, pero necesita de un apoyo de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla, abonos, herbicidas, fertilizante, etc. santos  tiene referencias de tener una moral intachable, responsable y de muy buena paga, confía que podrá responder a la deuda y al mismo tiempo podrá darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Santos is 57 years old and lives with his life partner and his three children. He makes a living from growing corn and beans. He has worked in agriculture for many years and so has a lot of experience. He is well known in the area and has a good clientele. He gets the best harvests and so sells a top quality product at very affordable prices as well as providing an unrivalled service. Santos is known for his friendliness. He is an enterprising man with a great desire to get on in life and thinks that making the most of opportunities will take him a step closer to success.

At the last harvest he did not make the profits he had hoped for. This time he wants to increase his production but he needs help with capital so he is asking INTEGRAL for a loan which will enable him to buy seeds, manure, weedkiller, fertilizer etc.

Santos is recommended for having impeccable morals and he is responsible and good with his payments. He is confident he will be able to pay off the loan and at the same time he will be able to give his family a full life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, weedkiller, fertilizer etc.

loans.name: Luis Francisco

texts.es: Luis de 44 años de edad se dedica a la pesca artesanal desde hace varios años, tiene mucha clientela ya que su producto es fresco y a precios realmente accesibles, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gasto de su hogar vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus tres hijos de 20, 18 y 9 años de edad ellos estudian actualmente, luis está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar trasmallos para la pesca y poder arreglar la lancha que es la que muestra la fotografía ya que esa es su fuente de trabajo para poder realizar la pesca, así poder obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Luis, 44, has worked fishing by hand for several years.  He has many customers because his product is fresh and prices are really affordable.  He uses profits earned to cover some of his household expenses.  He lives in his own house with his wife and three children who are 20, 18 and 9 years of age; all attend school.

Luis is asking for a loan to be able to buy dragnets to fish and to be able to repair the boat which is shown in the photograph since it’s his source of work to be able to fish.  He will thus be able to earn higher profits to give his family better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy dragnets and to repair the boat.

loans.name: Raeda

texts.en: Raeda was born in 1983. She is married and has two children. Raeda has been working in making artificial flower arrangements, for four years. She started her project by attending workshops where artificial flowers were made. One of the obstacles that she faced is not finding the needed sources to launch her work. Raeda is planning to put her products in showrooms and bazaars, so that she will get more sales in order to raise her income. Now she is requesting a Youth Loan, which she will use to buy leaves, sticks and farming pots.

loans.use: to import new flower-arranging materials

loans.name: Abeer

texts.en: Abeer. 21 years old, lives in Mafraq-Jordan where she is single and living with her family, which consists of five members. Abeer is In her third year of   studying for a Bachelor of Life Sciences degree, and she is planning to get her masters degree in the future to be able to work in her field professionally. As Abeer is having financial problems, she is requesting a loan to help pay for her study fees.

loans.use: To pay her study fees

loans.name: Nowara

texts.en: Nowara, a 23-year-old married mother of two, is in her fourth year of studies for a  Bachelor of Religion Assets degree. Nowara is planning to get her Masters degree in the future so that she can work in her field after graduation and earn enough income for her children's needs. She is currently facing a financial crisis and so is requesting a loan that covers her study fees.

loans.use: To pay for her study fees

loans.name: Esam

texts.en: Esam was born in 1963. He lives in Irbid, Jordan with his 6 children. Esam started trading clothes 6 months ago, and he found it a good source of income. He is currently running a clothing store and planning to expand it in the future. As the Eid is coming, Esam wants to benefit from it and do well selling his products. So, he is seeking a loan to buy new clothes and re-sell them during Ramadan and Eid.

loans.use: to buy new clothes and re-sell them during Ramadan and Eid.

loans.name: Matrishka

texts.en: Matrishka was born in 1971. She is married and has two sons. Her husband works in a mall. Matrishka has been working in selling foodstuffs from home for three years. She started her project in a room at her house and found it a profitable project. She faced an obstacle which is having competitors around her in the same area. Matrishka is planning to open her own mini market in the future to raise her income. Now she is asking for a loan to make some decorations for her workplace and to buy new foodstuffs in order to re-sell them.

loans.use: to make some decorations for her workplace and buy new foodstuffs.

loans.name: Cinthya Victoria

texts.es:
Cinthya es una joven que acabó de cumplir 20 años al iniciar el año, cuando terminó la secundaria salió de su ciudad natal en busca de mejores oportunidades y con la esperanza de continuar sus estudios, sin embargo no todo salió como esperaba y  al quedar embarazada, tuvo que buscar la manera de subsistir, situación con la cual su espíritu emprendedor se despertó y ha salido adelante por su hijo derivando cualquier tipo de obstáculos, Cinthya y su hijo de un poco más de un año de edad, viven en Guamaní un sector ubicado en el sur de la ciudad de Quito, capital de la República del Ecuador. Es uno de los barrios más poblados de la ciudad, por lo que se ha convertido en un lugar altamente comercial con negocios de todo tipo al alcance de todos sus habitantes. En los últimos años el sector privado ha aprovechado este crecimiento para ampliar la inversión y construir centros comerciales, conjuntos residenciales, etc. Sin embargo Guamaní tiene algunos problemas de seguridad por varios centros nocturnos que han sido abiertos en los últimos años, pero a pesar de esto su gente no pierde la esperanza y siempre se encuentran emprendiendo con ideas de negocio que beneficien a todos, pues piensan que se puede aprovechar el lugar por haber sido una morada de “los incas” en la historia, además porque las autoridades locales han optado por mejorar los sitios que guardan la historia de la ciudad al igual que implementar mayor seguridad en las calles.
Cinthya al experimentar la falta de empleo que se dio por la falta de estudios, decidió poco a poco emprender con su propio negocio, hace tres años ella identificó la necesidad de una tienda en el barrio donde ella vive, por lo que empezó probando vendiendo un par de productos básicos y al ver la acogida y demanda de sus clientes, rentó un cuarto con los servicios básicos que también tenía un local en el cual pudo abrir su tienda, trabajo en el cual permanece desde tempranas horas de la mañana hasta altas horas de la noche y lo mejor de esta actividad es que al mismo tiempo que trabaja puede cuidar a su hijo y hacer los quehaceres del hogar. Cinthya sueña con algún día poder tener su casa propia y ver a su hijo crecer en las mejores condiciones, es por eso que ella se esfuerza por cada día mejorar la atención en su negocio y también aprendiendo a administrar los recursos que tiene para cubrir siempre las necesidades básicas de ella y su hijo. Con la experiencia que ha adquirido esta joven madre, ahora quiere aumentar la oferta de los productos y comprar algunos artículos de primera necesidad de los cuales aún no se ha abastecido por la falta de capital, es por esto que ha solicitado un préstamo en Fundación Alternativa quienes a través de Kiva le ayudarán a financiar este paso de crecimiento en su negocio y además es de mucha motivación para ella que en todo el mundo si hay personas que creen en la juventud emprendedora y trabajadora de estos tiempos.
texts.en:
Cinthya is a young woman who just turned 20 years old at the beginning of the year. When she finished secondary school, she left her hometown in search of better opportunities and with the hope of continuing her studies. However, not everything worked out like she had hoped. After becoming pregnant she needed to look for a way to survive. Under these circumstances, her entrepreneurial spirit woke up and she has gotten through it for her son, averting all obstacles.

Cinthya and her son of just over a year old live in Guamaní, an area in the south of the city of Quito, capital of the Republic of Ecuador. It is one of the most populated areas in the city and has become highly commercialized, with all types of businesses available to its residents. In recent years the private sector has taken advantage of this growth as an opportunity to increase investment and construct shopping centers, residential compounds, etc. Guamaní has some security problems because of several night clubs that have opened in recent years, but despite this the people do not lose hope. They can always be found undertaking business ventures that benefit everyone. They believe that the place presents an opportunity for having been the historic home of the Incas and because the local authorities have chosen to improve the sites that hold the city's history and implement more security in the streets.

After experiencing the lack of employment available to her due to her lack of education, Cinthya gradually made the decision to start her own business. Three years ago she identified the need for a store in the neighborhood where she lives, and began selling a few basic products as a test. Upon seeing that it was in-demand and well-received by her customers, she rented a room with basic utilities that also had a space in which she could open her store. Here she works from the early hours of the morning until the late hours of the night. The best part is that while she is working she is also able to care for her son and complete household chores. 

Cinthya dreams of someday being able to have her own house and see her son grow up in the best conditions possible. It is for this that she strives everyday to improve the service of her business and is learning to manage the resources she has to meet the basic needs of her and her son. With the experience that this young mother has acquired, she would now like to increase the range of products she offers and purchase some essential items that she does not have in stock yet due to lack of capital. For this reason she has requested a loan with Fundación Alternativa, who, through Kiva, will help her finance this phase of business growth. On top of that, it is very motivating to her that throughout the world there are people who believe in the hard-working and entrepreneurial youth of our time.

loans.use: to purchase essential products for her store.

loans.name: Nazmeen

texts.en:
Nazmeen is a 50-year-old, married woman. For many years, she has been involved in the business of clothes sales. She purchases a wide variety of women's clothes from the market and then sells them to the people of her community. She has become famous by providing a good collection of clothes. 

In order to expand her business, Nazmeen needs to buy a greater variety of clothes, of lawn and chiffon, in different colors and designs. For this reason, she requested a loan of PKR 35,000 to increase her sales. She is in her fourth loan cycle, with a good loan history. Nazmeen expects a boost in her earnings and wishes to spend the earned revenue on the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety of clothes, of lawn and chiffon, in different colors and designs.

loans.name: Suriya

texts.en:
Suriya is a 51-year-old, married woman and mother of three children. One of her sons is shown in the photo. He is a driver by profession and provides transportation services, using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. 

For this reason, Suriya has applied for a loan of PKR 20,000, for her son who wants to buy new tires for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. 

Suriya is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her son and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires for her son's vehicle.

loans.name: Martha Alicia

texts.es:
Martha es una joven de 26 años de edad, madre soltera de una hija. A ella no le gusta pasar el tiempo sin hacer nada productivo, es muy trabajadora y busca como hacer para sobrevivir y ganar un poco de dinero extra, para darle lo mejor a su hija de 6 años de edad. Actualmente ella trabaja de ama de casa y en sus ratos libres trata de tener en buenas condiciones su cultivo de granos básicos como el maíz y en agosto también cultivara frijol.

Los insumos que utiliza para  la siembra de maíz y frijol como fertilizantes y herbicidas, los adquiere en distintos lugares en la ciudad. El tiempo que tarda el bus en llegar a la entrada del cantón  es de 30 minutos y desde la entrada en donde la deja el bus, le ayuda su hermano cargando en la espalda hasta llegar a su casa. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar 2 sacos de abono,  3 litros de herbicida ,  1 litro de insecticida y pago de mano de obra, para cultivar 7,000 metros cuadrados de frijol. De esta forma, busca que su cultivo este en buenas condiciones y con un manejo mas adecuado.

Martha quiere en un futuro poseer una casa mas grande para que sus futuros hijos y herederos puedan tener mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Martha, 26, is a young, single mother of a little girl.  She does not like to waste time being unproductive.  She’s very hardworking and finds ways to survive and earn a little extra money to give her six-year-old daughter the best.  She currently works as a housewife and uses her free time to keep her basic grain crops in good conditions.  She grows corn and in August will also grow beans.

She gets the supplies like fertilizer and herbicide she’ll use for the corn and bean crops in various places in the city.  The bus takes 30 minutes to get to the entrance to the canton and her brother helps her carrying the supplies on his back from where the bus drops her off to her home.

The loan she’s asking Fundación Campo for is to buy two sacks of manure, three liters of herbicide, one liter of insecticide and to pay labor costs to plant 7,000 square meters of beans.  In this way she seeks to keep this crop in good condition and to manage it more properly.

In future, Martha wants to have a bigger house so that her future children and heirs can have better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Marleni

texts.es: Marleny  es una joven de 23 años , está casada con Yuri y tiene 2 hijos con quienes vive en una casa alquilada. Es una mujer muy trabajadora y al encontrarse gestando a su tercer hijo permanece realizando labores menores como el alquiler de su mototaxi, lavado de ropa a domicilio,entre otros ya que su esposo se dedica a otras actividades . Uno de sus principales objetivos a largo plazo es comprar un lote de terreno y construir su vivienda propia ya que desea brindarles lo mejor a sus hijos. Por otro lado desea vender el vehiculo que tiene actualmente para comprar otra unidad ya que se encuentra en mal estado. Este es su tercer préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. En está oportunidad desea contar con 1,000 nuevos soles para usarlo junto a sus ahorros y comprar otra mototaxi para seguir alquilándolo.
texts.en:
Marleni is a 23-year-old young woman. She is married to Yuri and has two children with whom she lives in a rented home. She is a very hardworking woman and continues to do light work while she is pregnant with her third child. This includes renting out her mototaxi and providing home laundry services, among other things, since her partner works in other activities.

One of their main long term goals is to buy a plot of land and build their own home, since they want to provide the best for their children. Furthermore, they want to sell their current vehicle, which is in poor condition, and buy a different one. 

This is Marleni's third loan with Kiva and she feels grateful for the financial support that she has received in order to keep moving forward. In addition, she promises to make her loan payments in a punctual manner. On this occasion, she is asking for a loan of 1,000 nuevos soles to use along with her savings to buy a new mototaxi to continue renting it out.

loans.use: to buy another mototaxi.

loans.name: Benkadi   Iii Group

texts.fr:
Les  membres du groupe BENKADI  III sont  des femmes mariées avec une moyenne d’âge de 32 ans et ont en moyenne 3 enfants. Elles vivent la plupart dans des familles polygames à Massoukou un des villages de   préfecture de Dioila, région de Koulikoro, 2ème région administrative du mali.
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de micro finance Soro yiriwaso dans le but de pouvoir mieux organiser leurs activités en début d’hivernage. Les spéculations cultivées sont l’arachide, du mil. Elles sont à leur quatrième  collaboration avec l’institution.
Avec ce prêt,  Babene la première personne à gauche dans le rang des debout, compte acheter les intrants, les petits équipements et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir environs 1.5 ha de mil et d’arachide 
Les productions sont vendues au niveau de la ville de Marka Coungo après les récoltes à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Elle espère réaliser un bénéfice de 155.000F CFA environs par campagne.
texts.en:
The members of the Benkadi III group are married women who, on average, are 32 years old and have three children. They live mostly in polygamous families in Massoukou, one of the villages in the Dioila prefecture, Koulikoro, second administrative region of Mali.

The group is collaborating with the micro-finance institution Soro Yiriwaso in order to better organize their farming at the start of the rainy season. The group grows ground nuts and millet. They are on their fourth loan with the institution. 

Babene, the first person standing on the left, is going to use her loan to buy farm inputs and small pieces of equipment and also pay for the costs of labor to maintain about 1.5 hectares of millet and groundnuts. After the harvest, the crops are sold in the town of Marka Coungo to men and women customers.

Babene hopes to earn 155,000 francs CFA per harvest.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, herbicide, and small farm equipment, and to pay for labor and weeding

loans.name: Benkadi   Iv Group

texts.fr:
Les dix  membres du groupe BENKADI  IV sont  des femmes mariées avec une moyenne d’âge de 42 ans et ont en moyenne 4 enfants. Elles vivent la plupart dans des familles polygames à Massoukou un des villages de  préfecture de Dioila, région de Koulikoro, 2ème région administrative du mali.
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de micro finance Soro yiriwaso dans le but de pouvoir mieux organiser leurs activités en début d’hivernage. Les spéculations cultivées sont l’arachide, du mil. Elles sont à leur quatrième  collaboration avec l’institution.
Avec ce prêt,  Assitan la première personne à gauche dans le rang des debout, compte acheter les intrants, les petits équipements et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir environs 0.5 ha de mil et d’arachide 
Les productions sont vendues au niveau de la ville de Marka Coungo après les récoltes à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Elle espère  réaliser un bénéfice de 95 000F CFA environs par campagne.

Assitan, the first person standing on the left in the photo, with her loan, plans to buy farm inputs and small pieces of equipment, and to pay the costs of labor to maintain about a half of a hectare of millet and ground nuts. 

After the harvest, the crops are sold in the town of Marka Coungo to men and women customers. 

Assitan hopes to earn about 95,000 francs CFA per harvest.

Sali, the first person on the right in the front row, with her loan, plans to buy farm inputs and small pieces of equipment, and to pay the costs of labor to maintain about a half of a hectare of millet and ground nuts. 

After the harvest, the crops are sold in the town of Marka Coungo to men and women customers. 

Sali hopes to earn about 110,000 francs CFA per harvest.

Les dix membres du groupe DEMBAGNOUMA  I sont  des femmes mariées avec une moyenne d’âge de 41 ans et ont en moyenne 3 enfants. Elles vivent la plupart dans des familles polygames à Solomanibougou un des villages de Dioïla, région de Koulikoro, 2ème région administrative du mali.
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de micro finance Soro yiriwaso dans le but de pouvoir mieux organiser leurs activités en début d’hivernage. Les spéculations cultivées sont l’arachide, du mil. Elles sont à leur quatrième  collaboration avec l’institution.
Avec ce prêt,  Bintou la deuxième personne à gauche dans le rang des debout, compte acheter les intrants, les petits équipements et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir environs 1 ha de mil et d’arachide 
Les productions sont vendues au niveau de la ville de Marka Coungo après les récoltes à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Elle espère réaliser un bénéfice 125 000F CFA environs par campagne.
texts.en:
The ten members of "DEMBAGNOUMA I" are married women, who average 41 years of age and three children each. The women live for the most part in polygamous families in Solomanibougou, a village in Dioïla, Région de Koulikoro (2nd administrative region of the Republic of Mali). They are collaborating with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso with the goal of better organizing their work at the start of the rainy season. The crops grown are peanuts and millet. They are on their fourth loan with the institution. 

With this loan, Bintou, who is the second person standing from the left in the photo, intends to purchase farm inputs and sundry equipment and to pay for plowing to maintain about 1 hectare of millet and peanuts. After the harvest, the produce will be sold to men and women customers in Marka Coungo City. She hopes to make profit of about 125,000 francs CFA per planting.

loans.use: to pay for plowing, seeds, fertilizer, herbicide, weeding, and sundry equipment

loans.name: Dembagnouma  Ii Group

texts.fr:

They are collaborating with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso with the goal of better organizing their work at the start of the rainy season. The crops grown are peanuts and millet. They are on their fourth loan with the institution. 

With this loan, Fatoumata, who is the second person sitting from the right in the photo, intends to purchase farm inputs and sundry equipment and to pay for plowing to maintain about 1.5 hectares of millet and peanuts. After the harvest, the produce will be sold to men and women customers in Marka Coungo City. She earns about 145,000 francs CFA in profit per planting.

loans.use: to pay for plowing, seeds, fertilizer, herbicide, weeding, and sundry equipment

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
Vilma, 48 years of age, is married to a farmer, and they have been blessed with four children. She has owned and managed a retail store for almost two years. In this business, she's earning a net income of PHP 300, every day.

Due to a lack of capital, she decided to obtain a loan amounting to PHP 10,000. She will use the loan to purchase sugar, coffee, cooking oli, fish sauce, condiments and beverages, to sell. She's hoping that her requested loan will be granted, so that she can improve and expand her business to become more profitable.

loans.use: To purchase inventory for her general store, including sugar, coffee, and cooking oil

loans.name: Dionesia

texts.en: Dionesia is a 59 year old married woman from Talibon, Bohol. She has 9 grown children. She engages in a tuba vending business. She sells tuba (coconut wine) and soft drinks to the customers in the community. She has been into tuba vending for more than 10 years. Dionesia requested a loan of 3000 PHP to buy more bahalina (aged coconut wine) and soft drinks like Pepsi, to fill her store with more stock to attract more customers. In the future, Dionesia would like to expand her tuba vending to be successful and to set aside some of the profits in preparation for old age.

loans.use: to buy more bahalina (aged coconut wine) and soft drinks like Pepsi

loans.name: Dembagnouma  Iii Group

texts.fr:
Les  membres du groupe  DEMBAGNOUMA III sont des femmes mariées avec une moyenne d’âge de 39 ans et ont en moyenne 3 enfants. Elles vivent la plupart dans des familles polygames à Solomanibougou un des villages de Dioila, région de Koulikoro, 2ème région administrative du mali.
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de micro finance Soro yiriwaso dans le but de pouvoir mieux organiser leurs activités en début d’hivernage. Les spéculations cultivées sont l’arachide, du mil. Elles sont à leur quatrième  collaboration avec l’institution.

They are collaborating with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso with the goal of better organizing their work at the start of the rainy season. The crops grown are peanuts and millet. After the harvest, the produce will be sold to men and women customers in Marka Coungo City. She earns about 135,000 francs CFA in profit per planting.

loans.use: to pay for plowing, seeds, fertilizer, herbicide, weeding, and sundry equipment

texts.fr:

Elles collaborent avec l’institution de micro finance Soro yiriwaso dans le but de pouvoir mieux organiser leurs activités en début d’hivernage. Les spéculations cultivées sont l’arachide, du mil. Elles sont à leur quatrième  collaboration avec l’institution.

The women live for the most part in polygamous families in Solomanibougou, a village in Dioïla , Région de Koulikoro (2nd administrative region of the Republic of Mali). They are collaborating with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso with the goal of better organizing their work at the start of the rainy season. The crops grown are peanuts and millet. They are on their fourth loan with the institution. 

With this loan, Mah, who is standing in the middle in the photo, intends to purchase farm and sundry equipment and to pay for plowing to maintain about 1 hectare of millet and peanuts. After the harvest, the produce will be sold to men and women customers in Marka Coungo City. She earns about 140,000 francs CFA in profit per planting.

loans.use: to pay for plowing, seeds, fertilizer, herbicide, weeding, and sundry equipment

loans.name: Diosdada

texts.en:
Diosdada is a married woman from the town of Bien Unido, Bohol. She is engaged in a sari-sari or retail store business selling various goods and items to the people in her place. Her husband works as a fisherman.
Diosdada is asking for a loan to buy fishing nets for her husband's fishing venture. 
In the future, Diosdada hopes to improve their livelihood and experience fullness of life.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets.

loans.name: Mher

texts.en: Mher and his big nice family lives in Kapan city which is in Syunik region. He is married and he lives with his wife, father, brother and sister. Mher’s mother unfortunately died two years ago. His father works as a driver. The only person that helps Mher in farming is his brother, who works very hard and spends all his time on care of the farm animals. On the farm they keep a cow, a horse, eight piglets and fourteen pigs. Together they perfectly manage to sell a lot of pork during a month at Kapan; Kajaran butchers and the amount of income satisfies them. Nevertheless they have some new plans, since the family will become bigger and expenses as well. Mher in the near future will become a father; his brother also has plans of getting married; they also must take care of their sister. So, they have decided to take a loan in order to buy five bulls and animal fodder, to enrich their farm and make a profit of it.

loans.use: To buy five bulls and animal fodder to enrich their farm and make a profit.

loans.name: Las Semillas De San Francisco Group

texts.es: Amalia, que esta en el costado derecho sentada y con poleron blanco en la fotografía, pertenece al Banco Comunal Las Semillas de San Francisco, ubicado en Concepción VIII Región de Chile. En ESTE Banco Comunal sus socios tienen un rubro en común que es la venta, pero de distintos productos tales como, ropa, carbón, papas, frutas, costuras, cortinajes de baño, pescados y verduras, y Amalia vende accesorios de mujer. Comenzó su negocio hace más o menos un año, y comenzó vendiendo ropa, aunque con el tiempo se dio cuenta de que era mucho mejor vender accesorios para la mujer y más aún enfocando en el pelo de éstas. No ha tenido problemas en su negocio, lo que la tiene muy contenta. El crédito que ha solicitado es para poder comprara más insumos para sus ventas, como lo son perfumes, maquillaje y accesorios para el pelo. Está muy contenta porque sabe que le irá muy bien en este nuevo ciclo. Lo que más destaca de poder trabajar junto a Fondo Esperanza es poder conocer más gente y de esa manera compartir mucho más con su grupo.
texts.en:
Amalia who is seated on the right side wearing a white coat in the photo belongs to the “Las Semillas de San Francisco” (San Francisco Seeds) communal bank located in Concepción VIII Region, Chile.  All the members of this communal bank are in the same line of work, sales, but they sell different things like: clothes, charcoal, potatoes, fruit, textiles, shower curtains, fish and vegetables.

Amalia sells women’s accessories.  She started this business more or less a year ago and started out selling clothes but in time came to realize that it was much better to sell women’s accessories and even more so those focused on women’s hair.  She’s had no problems in her business which makes her very happy.

The loan she’s requesting is to buy more merchandise like perfume, make-up and hair accessories to sell.  She’s very happy because she knows she’ll do well in this new cycle.  What she most emphasizes about being able to work with Fondo Esperanza is being able to meet more people and share much more with her group this way.

loans.use: to buy hair accessories, perfume and make-up.

loans.name: Guadalupe

texts.es: La cliente es de Portoviejo.  Lleva 6 años en esta actividad, donde comenzó con muy poco capital.  Su hermana la incentivó enviándole mercadería desde Guayaquil para que la pueda vender.  Trabaja sola durante la tarde (de 2 a 7 pm).  Es casada y su esposo tiene un negocio de venta de legumbres.  Tienen 2 hijos, de 16 y 5 años, quienes estudian en el colegio y escuela fiscal respectivamente.  Necesita el préstamo para invertirlo en mercadería como edredones, ropa y cosméticos.
texts.en: This client is from Portoviejo.  She’s been in this activity for six years having started with very little capital.  Her sister motivated her sending her merchandise from Guayaquil that she could sell.  She works alone in the afternoon (2-7pm).  She’s married and her husband works selling vegetables.  They have two children who are 16 and 5 years of age and attend public secondary and elementary school respectively.  She needs the loan to buy merchandise like comforters, clothes and cosmetics.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.es:
Don Ricardo es originario de la ciudad de  león, tiene 60 años de edad, está casado y tiene dos hijos mayores de edad quienes lo apoyan con el negocio de  molinos. El crédito anterior lo utilizo para el mantenimiento de sus molinos,  este crédito lo está solicitando para sembrar maíz y darle mantenimiento a sus molinos. Esta inversión le permitirá obtener un mejor cultivo y de esta manera vender en mayor cantidad su producción, pues es en base a este grano que se obtiene bebidas típicas tales como pozol, pinolillo, tiste al igual también las tortillas  que es muy popular entre la población.
Su meta es distribuir su cosecha en diferentes puntos de ventas de la ciudad al igual que sus molinos. Está muy agradecido con Kiva y MiCredito por la ayuda que le han brindado, ya que ha podido salir adelante y crecer económicamente.
texts.en:
Ricardo is originally from the city of León.  He is 60 years old, married, and has two adult children who support him with his mills business. 

His previous loan was used for the maintenance of the mills.  The loan that is being requested is for planting corn and maintaining his mills. 

This investment will allow him to get better crop, and thus, sell a larger quantity of production.  It is based on the grain you get from typical Nicaraguan drinks, such as pozol and pinolillo [cornmeal and cacao drinks] and also tortillas that are very popular within the population.  His goal is to distribute his crop at different sales points in the city, as well as his mills.  He is very appreciative of Kiva and MiCredito for the help they have given, since he has been able to succeed and grow economically.

loans.use: to plant corn

loans.name: Jomayra Josefina

texts.es: La cliente corresponde a la ciudad de Portoviejo.  Empezó con un capital de $ 500, vendiéndole a los vecinos.  Poco a poco, fue solicitando crédito a los bancos comunales hasta crecer con su actividad hoy en día.  Trabaja sola a de miércoles a domingo desde las 10 am.  Se encuentra en estado de unión libre y su conviviente se dedica a la misma actividad, recorriendo sectores más alejandos de su zona de residencia.  Tienen un niño que cumpli´rá 2 años proximamente, además de estar embarazada de 6 meses.  Necesita el crédito para comprar sábanas, toldos y otra mercadería para su negocio.
texts.en: This client is from the city of Portoviejo.  She started out with $500 in capital selling to her neighbors.  Little by little she requested loans from communal banks to grow to the extent she has to this day.  She works alone from Wednesday to Sunday from 10am.  She’s in a common law relationship and her spouse is in the same line of work going to the areas in their zone that are farthest from their residence.  They have a little boy that will have his second birthday soon and she’s six-month’s pregnant.  She needs the loan to buy sheets, awnings and other merchandise for her business.

loans.use: to buy sheets, awnings and other household goods.

loans.name: Daniel Augusto

texts.es: El cliente es de Portoviejo.  Empezó vendiendo cepillos, pinzas y otros artículos; para luego vender carcasas de celulares donde le fue muy bien y decidió incrementar su stock para ofrecer más accesorios.  Trabaja todos los días en su local domiciliario y cuando le toca salir a vender a otro sitio, su mujer lo ayuda atendiendo el negocio.  Está en estado de unión libre y tienen 3 hijas que estudian en la escuela fiscal del sector.  Necesita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de carcasas, controles y memorias para su negocio.
texts.en: This client is from Portoviejo.  He started out selling brushes, pliers and other items and then started selling mobile phone cases and did very well so he decided to increase his stock to offer more accessories.  He works every day at his base location and when he needs to go sell somewhere else his wife helps him take care of the business.  He’s in a common law relationship and they have three daughters who attend the local public school.  He needs the loan to buy cases, controls and memories for the business.

loans.use: to buy cases,memories and controls.
